title: Miniml Anti-Bac Bathroom Cleaner Spray, 5L Refill - Cucumber & Mint Scent, Removes 99.9% of Bacteria, Cruelty-Free, Vegan, Natural & Plant-Based Powerful Anti-Bacterial Cleaning Formula Bulk Buy
features: ✅Effective Bacteria Removal: Miniml’s Anti-Bac Bathroom Cleaner eliminates 99.9% of bacteria, ensuring a hygienic, germ-free environment in your bathroom. Perfect for daily use and powerful cleaning without harsh chemicals.
✅Fresh Cucumber & Mint Scent: Enjoy the refreshing 100% natural aroma of cucumber and mint with every clean. The subtle fragrance leaves your bathroom smelling fresh and revitalized, naturally!

✅Eco-Friendly & Safe: Cruelty-free, vegan, and made from natural, plant-based ingredients. This cleaner is bleach-free and triclosan-free, providing a safe and sustainable cleaning solution for you and the planet.

✅ZERO WASTE: Our sustainable solutions go far beyond your purchase; refill your forever bottles with this 5 litre refill; the empty packaging from refills can be returned to our factory to be cleaned, reused and refilled; scan the QR code on the back of our refills to arrange a return so it can be reused again and again.
description: Product Description This Anti-Bac Bathroom Cleaner effortlessly tackles dirt, grime, and bacteria on all bathroom surfaces, making it a versatile and efficient choice for your home or business. Fast-acting and powerful, it effectively removes germs and buildup, leaving your bathroom fresh and spotless. Ingredients Aqua**, <5% Anionic Surfactants*, <5% Non-Ionic Surfactants*, Disinfectants*, Perfumes***, *Natural Origin (ISO 16128). **Water from The Yorkshire Moors. ***100% Natural Origin Aroma (ISO 16128)
